Room.Name: Amberton Lane
Room.ShortDescription: Amberton Lane continues to the north and south.
Room.LongDescription: Amberton Lane intersects Kafkan Way to the south, where the street abrubtly ends. You can see the large palace on top of an almost artificial looking mountain. The eerie palace overlooks the Necropolis. On the east side of the road, there is a large shopping complex which appears to specialize in various types of weaponry. There are no entrances on this side of the road, but you can probably get into the center from Kafkan Way.
